long_description: The Scott Contessa Speedster 35 women's road bike offers an aluminum frame with aerodynamic tubing and economical Shimano Sora components for entry-level road performance you won't soon outgrow. Double-butted 6061 aluminum frame boasts aerodynamic tube shaping for sleek, responsive performance. Carbon fork with alloy steer tube reduces weight and damps energy-draining road vibrations. Shimano triple crankset is paired with an 11-28 cassette for gear combinations to handle every ride. Shimano Sora derailleurs and shifters deliver dependable, responsive shifting through the 27 gears. Alex Race 28 Aero Profile rims are wrapped with Schwalbe Lugano tires to provide smooth-rolling performance. Please note: pedals are sold separately. Specs on the Scott Contessa Speedster 35 women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: The Scott Contessa Speedster 35 women's road bike offers an aluminum frame with aerodynamic tubing and economical Shimano Sora components for entry-level road performance you won't soon outgrow.
